title: Constructive feedback: Post-game chat / stats window and shop rune page
body:
I think the post-game screen looks great, however I think the chatbox is in the wrong location. The IP / MP icons would have ample room where the chatbox currently is, and vice versa for the chatbox. I think the old client had the chatbox right and the new client has the champion stats right.

Also I think the runes look great in the collection menu but the store sidepanel's drop-down menu is tedious. The store's sidepanel should be more like the collections sidepanel, the less clicks the better! Maybe copying the same text selection or simply having coloured icons to click?

Other than that, I like a lot of the changes and new features. The new rune and mastery pages are a huge improvement! Keep up the good work!
